content:
Hi all,

Symbolica AI (https://symbolica.ai) is currently hiring experts in term rewriting / graph rewriting / group theory / graph theory / and general theorem proving. Broadly, the company is a research lab that is developing an alternative to deep learning/neural networks using hypergraph rewriting. Currently, we are actively working on delivering an alternative to the transformer architecture using these symbolic systems as a foundation. If you are available for full time hire and this sounds interesting to you please don't hesitate to reach out!

George
